headerDisplay: For help and support please visit our GitHub Wiki. We hope you find this plugin useful!

username.title: Username
username.description: Your username for accessing the Flume site at https://portal.flumetech.com

password.title: Password
password.description: Your password for accessing the Flume site

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: Your Client ID for API access, found in Settings on the Flume site

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: Your Client Secret for API access, found in Settings on the Flume site

refreshInterval.title: Refresh interval
refreshInterval.description: Number of minutes between updates. API has a cap of 120 calls per hour.

threshold.title: Adjustment for False Positives
threshold.description: Set to ignore a steady water draw below this value (gallons).

disableDeviceLogging.title: Disable Device Logging
disableDeviceLogging.description: Global logging setting for accessory status changes. If true then accessory status changes will not be logged.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: Global logging setting for the plugin. If true then debug information will be added to the log.

disablePlugin.title: Disable Plugin
disablePlugin.description: If true, the plugin will remove all accessories and not load the plugin on restart.

layout.title: Optional Settings
layout.description: Optional settings for the plugin, including global logging settings.
